Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.client

Class SocketAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket.client.SocketAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientAction
public class SocketAction extends Object implements ClientAction
The SocketAction class implements ClientAction interface Notifies the server of client actions when the chosen connection type is socket
